text: avarea, van papannalum nicavrttikalum varjikkunnavaran. keaccu vilcakalealike. niscayamayum ninre nathan udaramayi pearukkunnavanan. ninnale bhumiyil ninn srsticcuntakkiyappealum ninnal ninnalute matakkalute garbhasayattil bhrunamayirunnappealum ninnalepparri nannayariyunnavan avan tanne. atinal ninnal svayam visud'dhi camayatirikkuka. yathartha bhaktanarenn nannayariyunnavan avan matraman
